title: Social Domain Job Competency Enhancement Using Imagination-Based Education (IE) Theory and Constructivist Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in social sciences and practical experience, with digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: An environment encouraging collaborative knowledge building among learners through VR simulations and digital tools. Focuses on improving problem-solving skills in social domains via critical reflection and imagination-linked activities.

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more strategies for creatively solving social issues using simulation/VR tools in a constructivist learning environment
Learners can derive and explain at least two instructional design principles required in job contexts by applying Imagination-Enhanced Education (IE) theory
Learners can co-construct communal knowledge on social topics through collaboration with peers and submit the outcomes as digital portfolios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
